page.title: 20ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS
page.content:
Upper Annandale & Town of Moffat-{ {Michael Stewart Craigbeck Farm-{James Wheatcroft At Work In Moffat-{Emma Hudson} Farmer's boy-{Robbie Graham My Day-{Michael Stewart Moffat Wildlife-{Eric Innes Annandale Wildlife-{Alan Smith} Moffat remembered-{Susie Beattie} Youthful view-{Pauline Davis From the outside-{Primary 7,Academy} Annual Events-{Bethan Kitt District or Region-{Primary 7} Education-{Mr.John Stevenson}
The Project Coordinator Mr.P.Smith wishes to thank everyone who helped with these and the other items included.In particular{Mrs.J Boyd}for her tremendous local knowledge,{Mrs.J {Richardson}and Primary 7 class teacher {Mrs.M.Wilson}for much hard work.
